plugin.name: TP_Portal_Creator
plugin.author: Koala
plugin.purpose: A helper plugin for creating TP Portals

muclient.triggers:
<trigger match="^(?\w+) now has (?\d{1,3}(,\d{3})*(\.\d+)?) qp, (?\d{1,3}(,\d{3})*(\.\d+)?) tp and (?\d{1,3}(,\d{3})*(\.\d+)?) gold.$" name="VALIDATE_Player" enabled="n" group="TriviaPortalCreator" omit_from_output="n" regexp="y" sequence="99" script="VALIDATE_Player">
<trigger match="^There is no player with the name (?\w+)\.$" name="VALIDATE_PlayerName" enabled="n" group="TriviaPortalCreator" omit_from_output="n" regexp="y" sequence="99" script="VALIDATE_Player">
<trigger match="^\s+I\)\s+First\s+room\s+:\s+(?.*)\s+\(.*\)$" name="ASSIGN_FirstRoom" enabled="n" group="TriviaPortalCreator" omit_from_output="n" regexp="y" sequence="99" script="ASSIGN_FirstRoom">
<trigger match="^1 \* generic trivia portal \(badtrip-9\) loaded - (?.*)\.$" name="ASSIGN_TriviaPortalID" enabled="n" group="TriviaPortalCreator" omit_from_output="n" regexp="y" sequence="99" script="ASSIGN_TriviaPortalID">
muclient.script:
--[[ External Resources ]]-- dofile(GetInfo(60) .. "aardwolf_colors.lua") -- Used to support Aard Colors for the cnote() function require "gmcphelper" require 'serialize'
Debug = false Prepend = "@D[@x166TP Portal Creator@D]: @w"
-- Basic print function that supports aard, xterm, and ANSI color codes [idea from Durel's Inventory script] function cnote(string) AnsiNote(stylesToANSI(ColoursToStyles(string))) end function dnote(str) if Debug then cnote("@R[DEBUG]: @w"..str.."@w") end end
-- TP Portal Creator Table function initializeTPPortal() TPPortal = { } TPPortal.default = "badtrip-9" TPPortal.tpcost = 15 TPPortal.retry = 1 TPPortal.reason = "Trivia Portal" TPPortal.id = 0 TPPortal.destination = "" TPPortal.area = "" TPPortal.short = "" TPPortal.long = "" TPPortal.keyword = "portal trivia " TPPortal.owner = "" end
function COMMAND_TPPortal( name, line, args ) initializeTPPortal() TPPortal.owner = string.lower(utils.inputbox( "Who are you creating the portal for?", "Trivia Portal Owner", "None" )) dnote( ("%s Owner has been set to: @Y%s@w"):format(Prepend, TPPortal.owner) ) EnableTrigger("VALIDATE_Player",true) EnableTrigger("VALIDATE_PlayerName",true) SendNoEcho( ("pcharge %s 0 0 0 0"):format(TPPortal.owner) ) end
function VALIDATE_Player( name, line, args ) if name == "VALIDATE_PlayerName" then dnote( ("%s args.tp did not get assigned!!!"):format(Prepend) ) cnote( ("%s The tp argument did not get assigned. Aborting the script..."):format(Prepend) ) EnableTrigger("VALIDATE_Player",false) EnableTrigger("VALIDATE_PlayerName",false) EnableTriggerGroup("TriviaPortalCreator",false) initializeTPPortal() return elseif name == "VALIDATE_Player" then if not args.tp then dnote( ("%s args.tp did not get assigned!!!"):format(Prepend) ) cnote( ("%s The tp argument did not get assigned. Aborting the script..."):format(Prepend) ) EnableTrigger("VALIDATE_Player",false) EnableTrigger("VALIDATE_PlayerName",false) EnableTriggerGroup("TriviaPortalCreator",false) initializeTPPortal() return end local tp = string.gsub( args.tp, "%,", "" ) if tonumber(tp) < tonumber(TPPortal.tpcost) then dnote( ("%s Player did not have enough tp!!!"):format(Prepend) ) cnote( ("%s Player(%s) has insufficient tp. Aborting the script."):format(Prepend, TPPortal.owner) ) EnableTrigger("VALIDATE_Player",false) EnableTrigger("VALIDATE_PlayerName",false) EnableTriggerGroup("TriviaPortalCreator",false) initializeTPPortal() return else local area = utils.inputbox( "What is the destination area for this Trivia Portal?", "Trivia Portal Destination", "aylor" ) if area == nil then dnote( ("%s 'area == nil' detected. Either the 'cancel' button was pressed or something else happened!"):format(Prepend) ) cnote( ("%s You pressed the cancel button. Aborting the script..."):format(Prepend) ) EnableTrigger("VALIDATE_Player",false) EnableTrigger("VALIDATE_PlayerName",false) EnableTriggerGroup("TriviaPortalCreator",false) return else TPPortal.area = string.lower(area) dnote( ("%s Area has been set to: @Y%s@w"):format(Prepend, string.lower(TPPortal.area)) ) end TPPortal.short = utils.inputbox( "What should the short description be for this TP Portal?", "Trivia Portal Short Description", "None" ) dnote( ("%s Short Description has been set to: @Y%s@w"):format(Prepend, TPPortal.short) ) TPPortal.long = utils.inputbox( "What should the long description be for this TP Portal?", "Trivia Portal Long Description", "None" ) dnote( ("%s Long Description has been set to: @Y%s@w"):format(Prepend, TPPortal.long) ) TPPortal.keyword = TPPortal.keyword .. utils.inputbox( "What should the keywords be for this TP Portal?", "Trivia Portal Keywords", "Trivia Portal" ) dnote( ("%s Keywords have been set to: @Y%s@w"):format(Prepend, TPPortal.keyword) ) EnableTrigger("ASSIGN_FirstRoom",true) EnableTrigger("INVALID_TriviaPortalAreaKeyword", true ) EnableTrigger("VALIDATE_Player",false) EnableTrigger("VALIDATE_PlayerName",false) cnote( ("%s Sending the command 'zstat %s' to get the first room information."):format(Prepend, string.lower(TPPortal.area)) ) SendNoEcho( ("zstat %s"):format(string.lower(TPPortal.area)) ) end end end
function INVALID_TriviaPortalAreaKeyword( name, line, args ) EnableTrigger("INVALID_TriviaPortalAreaKeyword", false) TPPortal.area = "retry" if TPPortal.retry > 2 then cnote( ("%s It appears as if you do not know the area keyword. Please do some research and try again. Aborting the script..."):format(Prepend) ) EnableTrigger("ASSIGN_FirstRoom",false) EnableTrigger("INVALID_TriviaPortalAreaKeyword", false) EnableTriggerGroup("TriviaPortalCreator",false) return end TPPortal.retry = TPPortal.retry + 1 cnote( ("%s The area keyword you used was invalid. Please try again..."):format(Prepend, TPPortal.area) ) local area = utils.inputbox( "What is the destination area for this Trivia Portal?", "(RETRY) Trivia Portal Destination", "aylor" ) if area == nil then dnote( ("%s 'area == nil' detected. Either the 'cancel' button was pressed or something else happened!"):format(Prepend) ) cnote( ("%s You pressed the cancel button. Aborting the script..."):format(Prepend) ) EnableTrigger("ASSIGN_FirstRoom",false) EnableTrigger("INVALID_TriviaPortalAreaKeyword", false) EnableTriggerGroup("TriviaPortalCreator",false) return elseif area and TPPortal.area == "retry" then TPPortal.area = string.lower(area) dnote( ("%s Area has been set to: @Y%s@w"):format(Prepend, string.lower(TPPortal.area)) ) SendNoEcho( ("zstat %s"):format(string.lower(TPPortal.area)) ) EnableTrigger("INVALID_TriviaPortalAreaKeyword", true) end end
function ASSIGN_FirstRoom( name, line, args ) if not args.firstroom then dnote( ("%s args.firstroom did not get assigned!!!"):format(Prepend) ) cnote( ("%s The firstroom argument did not get assigned. Aborting the script..."):format(Prepend) ) EnableTrigger("ASSIGN_FirstRoom",false) EnableTrigger("INVALID_TriviaPortalAreaKeyword", false ) EnableTriggerGroup("TriviaPortalCreator",false) initializeTPPortal() return end TPPortal.destination = args.firstroom dnote( ("%s Destination room has been set to: @Y%s@w"):format(Prepend, TPPortal.destination) ) EnableTrigger("ASSIGN_FirstRoom",false) EnableTrigger("INVALID_TriviaPortalAreaKeyword", true ) EnableTrigger("ASSIGN_TriviaPortalID",true) cnote( ("%s Sending the command 'oload %s' to load the default Trivia Portal and obtain the object ID of it."):format(Prepend, TPPortal.default) ) SendNoEcho( ("oload %s"):format(TPPortal.default) ) end
function ASSIGN_TriviaPortalID( name, line, args ) if not args.id then dnote( ("%s args.id did not get assigned!!!"):format(Prepend) ) cnote( ("%s The id argument did not get assigned. Aborting the script..."):format(Prepend) ) EnableTrigger("ASSIGN_TriviaPortalID",false) EnableTriggerGroup("TriviaPortalCreator",false) initializeTPPortal() return end TPPortal.id = tostring(args.id) dnote( ("%s Trivia Portal ID has been set to: @Y%s@w"):format(Prepend, TPPortal.id) ) EnableTrigger("ASSIGN_TriviaPortalID",false) PROCESS_TriviaPortal() end
function PROCESS_TriviaPortal() cnote( ("%s Sending the command 'oset %s destination %s' to set the destination on the Trivia Portal."):format(Prepend, TPPortal.id, TPPortal.destination) ) SendNoEcho( ("oset %s destination %s"):format(TPPortal.id, TPPortal.destination) ) cnote( ("%s Sending the command 'ostring %s short \"%s\"' to set the short description."):format(Prepend, TPPortal.id, TPPortal.short) ) SendNoEcho( ("ostring %s short \"%s\""):format(TPPortal.id, TPPortal.short) ) cnote( ("%s Sending the command 'ostring %s long \"%s\"' to set the long description."):format(Prepend, TPPortal.id, TPPortal.long) ) SendNoEcho( ("ostring %s long \"%s\""):format(TPPortal.id, TPPortal.long) ) cnote( ("%s Sending the command 'ostring %s keyword \"%s\"' to set the keywords."):format(Prepend, TPPortal.id, TPPortal.keyword) ) SendNoEcho( ("ostring %s keyword \"%s\""):format(TPPortal.id, TPPortal.keyword) ) cnote( ("%s Sending the command 'ostring %s OWNER %s' to set the owner."):format(Prepend, TPPortal.id, TPPortal.owner) ) SendNoEcho( ("ostring %s OWNER %s"):format(TPPortal.id, TPPortal.owner) ) cnote( ("%s Sending the command 'doat %s give %s %s' to give the portal to the owner."):format(Prepend, TPPortal.owner, TPPortal.id, TPPortal.owner) ) SendNoEcho( ("doat %s give %s %s"):format(TPPortal.owner, TPPortal.id, TPPortal.owner) ) cnote( ("%s Sending the command 'pcharge %s 0 %d 0 %s' to set the long description."):format(Prepend, TPPortal.owner, TPPortal.tpcost, TPPortal.reason) ) SendNoEcho( ("pcharge %s 0 %d 0 %s"):format(TPPortal.owner, tonumber(TPPortal.tpcost), TPPortal.reason) ) cnote( ("%s Trivia Portal Creation has been completed!!"):format(Prepend) ) EnableTriggerGroup("TriviaPortalCreator",false) initializeTPPortal() end
function OnPluginInstall() OnPluginEnable() end function OnPluginEnable() initializeTPPortal() end function OnHelp () world.Note (world.GetPluginInfo (world.GetPluginID (), 3)) end
